											A look at DC's 19 wins to date* in 2007:
Tour of California (3 wins): 2 stages and Levi Leipheimer GC triumph
Valencia (1): Alberto Contador stage win
Paris-Nice (4): 3 stages and Contador GC
Castilla Leon (2): 1 stage and Contador GC
DePanne (1): Stijn Devolder TT victory
Georgia (4): 3 stages and Brajkovic GC
Catalunya (1): Allan Davis stage win
Belgium (2): Gusev TT and GC wins
Switzerland (1): Gusev
* - Through June 22



















											
											Starting at the 2007 Tour de France, Mio Technology Europe -- one of the leading players in the mobile GPS industry -- is joining the Discovery Channel Pro Cycling sponsor family as the team's Official Personal Navigation Device.
  
"Mio Technology supports the spirit of competition and is enthusiastic to be backing the impressive Discovery Channel Pro Cycling Team, which has proven itself time and time again," says Paul Notteboom, president of Mio Technology. Each of the 20 Team Cars following and taking care of the cycling team will be equipped with a Mio navigation device for the entire duration of the cycling season. Mio is making its mark both in delivering the team members and staff safely to their destinations worldwide, and via logo exposure on the team jersey as well.
